tooltip.ae2_overclocked.capacity_card: Increases internal slot stack limits for processing machines.
tooltip.ae2_overclocked.super_energy_car: Increases the machine's internal energy buffer capacity.
tooltip.ae2_overclocked.parallel_card: Processes recipes in parallel and outputs products directly to the ME network.
message.ae2_overclocked.parallel_card_co: Another parallel card is already installed. Only one parallel card per machine is allowed.
config.ae2_overclocked.cards.tooltip: Balance settings for Capacity / Super Energy / Parallel Max cards.
config.ae2_overclocked.cards.capacityCar: Maximum stack size per machine slot when Capacity Card is installed.
config.ae2_overclocked.cards.superEnergy: Internal energy buffer limit in FE when Super Energy Card is installed. (Internally converted with 1 AE = 2 FE)
config.ae2_overclocked.cards.parallelCar: Parallel multiplier used by Parallel Card Max.
